Key Match Events: Wales led 2-0 at half-time before being pegged back
Logi Tomasson scored and then forced Danny Ward into an unfortunate own goal at his near post inside three second-half minutes
Pre-Game Insights: Bellamy said he knew it was going to be a difficult game due to his admiration for Iceland
Post-Match Reflections: Bellamy remained upbeat after the draw, saying he was really pleased and enjoyed the game
Bellamy said the draw was not him trying to sugar-coat the result, but rather a positive take on the game
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wales extended their unbeaten Nations League start to three games with a 2-2 draw
Iceland are a point behind Wales at the halfway stage of the campaign
